title: The Truth Behind Bard
body:
The truth rito doesn't want you to know...
Bard is really just a giant beard.
he has no face or skin that shows anywhere.
On his left arm he has stitches sewing his coat into his body/hairballness.
Confirmed bard is just a giant beard.

replies.body: BRB, going to go and try to get his lore changed to support this.
ಠ_ಠ

They say his beard has settled many disputes, as well it also holds the very fabric of the universes.
It is told at the dawn of time Bard sacrificed a portion of his beard to allow all life to exist.

This is one of many stories told by the Bard, the race of people who are truly more in touch with their inner beards.
http://weknowmemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/its-not-the-beard-on-the-outside-that-counts-its-the-beard-on-the-inside.jpg
